Html:
I've noticed that in the latest version of Rawr, 2.3.1, socket bonuses are missing from a lot of the weapons in the Main Hand slot.  For example, look at Distant Land or Orca-Hunter's Harpoon on Wowhead.  They have socket bonuses, but these do not appear in Rawr.  Just want to bring the issue to light since I always fall back to good ol' Rawr when deciding what to gem. ;)

 

(Brasso - Galakrond (US) - Feral DPS/Feral Tank)
Please search for existing issues before posting. The new data is almost entirely from the Armory which doesn't provide socket bonus info.
I did take a look around but honestly I didn't know what to search for.  How come other (pre-3.3) weapons have socket bonus info then?  Was it just added manually?

Well the socket bonus is definitely on Wowhead for the weapons that are on there already . I know the top tier H 25 weapons are not there yet, but some of the H ICC 5-man weapons are.  For example: http://www.wowhead.com/?item=50296

Refresh from wowhead is not always providing bonus info either even when it's ther eon wowhead when you open in wowhead.

Mostly though it's from the armory thing.

*sigh*.

The new data is almost entirely from the Armory which doesn't provide socket bonus info.

Astrylian wrote:

*sigh*.

The new data is almost entirely from the Armory which doesn't provide socket bonus info.

Thanks for bolding that.  I am extremely thick and I didn't read that the first time.  Why would you even mention Wowhead?

There is an issue though Astrylian...

File->load from armory, Noen, Uldum, US

Note hat, T9 (245) enhancement, has no socket bonus

Right click it, Refresh from wowhead

Note still no bonus

Right click, Open in wowhead

Has socket bonus in wowhead
Ah, thank you khanthal.  All I needed to do was Refresh from Wowhead.  Seems Astrylian was missing a couple words there and could have better explained it for an idiot such as I.

Can't tell everyone how much I love the attitude of some posters here lately.

(And yes, as documented in an open issue, some socket bonuses don't import right from Wowhead either.)

Astrylian wrote:

Can't tell everyone how much I love the attitude of some posters here lately.

(And yes, as documented in an open issue, some socket bonuses don't import right from Wowhead either.)

Sorry I interpreted your first reply as "there is an open issue about armory socket bonuses".  My apologies.
